name: We Might As Well Die
description:
A Man. A world bathing in peace. Near Immortality, all loved ones died.

What makes a man choose to live? What does he have to live for?

Join the hero's journey of self-discovery as he makes goes through his past recollections as a celebrated slayer of the mythical beast, and makes a desicion that will change the way he looks at the world....forever.
